name: Lucky 7
description:
Try your luck! Lucky 7 is a single-player card game where seven cards are dealt in front of you at random. You win by managing to flip over all seven cards.

How To Play:

The first card to flip is your choice. After that, the card you flip will have a number on it. This is the position on the table of the next card you must flip. If that card has already been flipped, you lose. If you got lucky with your choice and manage to get all cards flipped over, you win!
